styles.name: default
styles.evalScript:
ndvi = (B05-B04)/(B05+B04)

if (ndvi<-1.0) return [1.0,1.0,1.0]
    else if (ndvi<-0.4) return [1.0,1.0,1.0]
    else if (ndvi<-0.3) return [0.9,0.9,0.9]
    else if (ndvi<-0.15) return [0.4,0.6,1.0]
    else if (ndvi<0.2) return [0.9,0.85,0.75]
    else if (ndvi<0.4) return [0.6,0.5,0.2]
    else if (ndvi<0.6) return [0.6,0.8,0.5]
    else if (ndvi<0.8) return [0.35,0.75,0.1]
    else if (ndvi<1.0) return [0.2,0.5,0.1]
    else if (ndvi>1.0) return [1.0,1.0,1.0]
    else return [1.0,1.0,1.0];

styles.name: default
styles.evalScript:
ndwi = (B03-B05)/(B05+B03)

if (ndwi<-1.0) return [1.0,1.0,1.0]
    else if (ndwi<-0.7) return [1.0,1.0,1.0]
	else if (ndwi<-0.2) return [0.9,0.85,0.75]
    else if (ndwi<0.1) return [0.6,0.5,0.2]
    else if (ndwi<0.4) return [0.4,0.6,1.0]
    else if (ndwi<0.8) return [0.1,0.4,1.0]
    else if (ndwi<1.0) return [0.2,0.2,0.7]
    else return [1.0,1.0,1.0];
